questions.question: 1. An organism is resistant to an antibiotic means

answers.b: Able to grow well in the MHA plate
answers.c: Can grow around the impregnated antibiotic disk
answers.d: Cannot grow in the presence of antibiotic disk

questions.question: 2. 0.5 McFarland standard solution is a combination of

answers.b: Barium chloride dihydrate and sulfuric acid

questions.question: 3. Factors which influence antimicrobial susceptibility testing is/are
